title: GuesserOutput
description: Structured output from the guesser LLM. The 'guesses' array enum is dynamically populated with unrevealed board words.

reasoning.description: Brief explanation of the guessing strategy

guesses.description: Ordered list of guesses from most to least confident

word.description: The word being guessed (must be from unrevealed words enum)

should_stop.description: Whether the guesser recommends stopping after a certain point

stop_after.description: If should_stop is true, stop after this many guesses
